game_description: Immerse yourself in music & find your groove in the comfort of your own home. The wait is over, Bubble Boogie is here! NEW: XMAS UPDATE! Pop through 15 unique songs that will have you shaking and moving in ways you never knew you could! Once you’ve mastered Casual Mode, why not challenge yourself in Pro mode where you can REALLY test your skills? Our game features the smash 70s hit song 'Boogie Oogie Oogie' to give you a taster of what Bubble Boogie is all about. It also features; 5 Star Scoring system One virtual club – 'The Boogie Dome' Dance move instructor Crowd to cheer you on Casual & Pro mode Local leaderboard 15 Unique Songs See you on the dance floor! ♪┏(・o･)┛♪┗ ( ･o･) ┓♪
review_1: Played Bubble Boogie today the first time and it was a lot of fun. Love the disco music from the good old days. Wasn't first easy to play, but you get the rhythm real quick. Loved it.
review_2: Really loved it, it was very enjoyable
review_3: Been playing this game with some friends. Best part is that you are doing real dance moves to pop the bubbles. Rather than just hitting objects. Songs not well known but still great fun to play. Couldn't put my name into leaderboard which would be really cool. With real pop songs this is a winner
review_4: Great idea, fun name, nice environment and cool tracks. One thing I think needs work is the gameplay. Not enough feedback on what I'm doing. Some work on the explosion fx and maybe some sound fx would be nice. Also combos? I'm not sure if they're in there but I couldn't trigger them. It needs to feel good when popping the bubbles. Its almost there but not quite. All in all a really nice game though. Looking forward to see some updates. Can recommend.
review_5: Game could of been fun, but the songs are so bad you can't play with volume on....
